## Phylogenetic Tree Visualization with Annotations

## Description
This project visualizes core genome MLST (cgMLST) phylogenetic trees for E. coli with mcr.1 gene that reported from arabic gulf countries with multiple annotation layers including:
- Source information (Human, Animal, etc.)
- Collection dates
- Geographic locations
- cgMLST types

## Requirements
- **R** (version 4.0 or higher)
- **R Packages**:
  ```r
  install.packages(c("ggtree", "ape", "ggnewscale", "dplyr", "tidyr", "ggplot2", "ggtreeExtra"))
